new: Completely redesigned user interface with a sleek, modern design
New structured editor for more intuitive editing of backups
Improved theme system with smooth transition between light and dark modes
New tabbed navigation system for better organization
improved: Modernized, modular JavaScript architecture for improved performance
Improved error handling and user feedback
New modal system for changelog with fluid animations
fixed: Fixed display problems on small screens
Better handling of backup decryption errors
Corrected contrast problems for better readability

improved: Major CSS redesign for enhanced responsiveness. The site now adapts more effectively to a range of screen sizes, including mobile devices.
Note: Some minor adjustments are still needed for smaller screens, which will be addressed in a future update when time permits.
As color selection isn't my strongest suit, feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request on GitHub if you have suggestions for improving the color scheme.
Improved meta tags for enhanced SEO
Added convenient copy and paste buttons for easier user interaction

new: Implemented save editor feature for better user experience
Initial release of the save editor with foundational features

info: Android is not supported at the moment
